name: Player:Void
description: This game is honored to the original Asteroids concept while allowing players to fight one another and dealing with black holes! Of course using worm holes to your advantage might be the edge you need out in space! I am a full time college student and solo dev. who had help from a friend making some assets in this game. A lot of the sprites and all of the audio was provided using free assets on the Unity Store. I really enjoyed making this game and hope you all enjoy!! And of course feedback is welcome!!
